Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow Pilots. After extensive testing of kerbal hospital facilities Optical Solutions Proudly presents our line of mostly air worthy crafts. Created from the finest parts salvaged from our most promising experiments, you can expect craftsmanship of only the highest quality, after all, they survived this long!

This is our first Commercially available, All stock, Space plane, the Falcon XM-1, this twitch craft is quick and crisp, able to perform Ariel stuns or recon. do watch out however, it can get away from you. its design, is simple, but effective, able to take off at just between 35-40 KPH. do however take care when landing, because of its small stature, its advised you give it a nice ebbing course to the ground, to much horizontal force may result in a long walk home.

Edited August 29, 2012 by opticalshadow
Not bad for a first! I like it. -DR

Thanks! im having difficulty going into .16, none of my .15 models work, and im finding great difficulty in controling in .16 this was the first one i got mildly stable. until i figure out what changed between versions ill just have alot of trial and error. for this one i decided it went stright enough, lets make it look cool too.
